ogTitle: quote of the day: louis may alcott
ogDescription: i am not afraid of storms for i am learning how to sail my ship.

card_1.cardText:
> _“I am not afraid of storms for I am learning how to sail my ship.”_

LOUISA MAY ALCOTT

card_10.cardText:
#OTD in 1832 the author of "Little Women" was born. The novel about four sisters during the 1860s, which she wrote at age 36, was an instant best seller. Alcott grew up in poverty, but gained much fame & fortune from the book and its spin-offs. In 2019, the second American big screen film adaption of the book will be released.

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/18-11-29-qtd-alcott/)
